top_comments.comment: It's always a pleasure dying in your videos
Wow!!  I'm the generation who grew up with Saturday Night Fever and the BeeGees.  That was pure genius!!  I want to see more.

comments_since_last_sample.body: I'm going to date myself. I remember when this was released aby the Bee Gees. And it was good. I must say, I enjoyed your version much better 😊 and thank you for the warning at the beginning of your video. I'm sure the video is amazing, since you all sang so wonderfully!! However, blinking lights can bring on a vertigo attack (lol I don't even get those right. Instead of the room "constantly spinning" mine rocks. Like I'm on a rocking horse and I can't get off. And it can last anywhere from a few minutes to a month.) Anyways, can't wait to hear more of your music! So glad I'm a subscriber 🥰
Violet's makeup at the end was superb! And the whole cover was just amazing.

Do we really have to have a cheesy video when we remake a song? NO!  Just stick to your talents, music, not videography because you are going to suck at one of them and chances are it will be the one you aren't good at.
